OrgName.entry: AGE CONCERN SHEFFIELD - UNDERSTANDING TODAYS TECHNOLOGY

Desc.entry:
A chargeable service available to anyone aged 50 years and over, including those in receipt of individual budgets, who would like to purchase one-to-one support to learn how to use a computer, set up a DVD recorder or digital TV, learn how to use a mobile phone or need help choosing the right computer equipment. The service is tailored to the individual needs of the customer through support planning and can be delivered in their own home or at the Age Concern resource centre in the city centre. This individual training can be purchased in 2 hour packages. Please contact for further information.
A registered charity and company limited by guarantee no 5207254
